Search the FrankenTUI codebase for TODO, FIXME, HACK, unimplemented!, todo!, and similar markers that indicate work that needs to be done, specifically in:
1. crates/frankenterm-core/src/ (parser, grid, scrollback)
2. crates/frankenterm-web/src/ (the web frontend)
3. crates/ftui-pty/src/ (PTY bridge)

Focus on finding actionable items that would improve correctness or test coverage. List each finding with file:line and the context.

Also check if there are any test files with #[ignore] attributes that indicate disabled tests.

Be thorough but concise â€” just list the findings.
